mapper.select: select commentNo, commentTitle, commentContents, boardNo, commentDate, commentUser from comments
select commentNo, commentTitle, commentContents, boardNo, commentDate, commentUser from comments where commentNo = #{commentNo}
select commentNo, commentTitle, commentContents, boardNo, commentDate, commentUser from comments where boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: insert into comments (commentNo, commentTitle, commentContents, boardNo, commentDate, commentUser) values (#{commentNo},#{commentTitle},#{commentContents},#{boardNo}, #{commentDate},#{commentUser})
